text: The Man and the Woman is a 1908 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Man and the Woman and stars George Gebhardt, Linda Arvidson, and Charles Inslee. ==Actors== * George Gebhardt as Tom Wilkins * Linda Arvidson as Gladys * Charles Inslee as False Clergyman * Harry Solter as Priest ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Man and the Woman
